author: sky.cactus
content: It would be helpful for these summaries (and <@415548822983278593>'s summaries in chat) to include EIP titles, not only numbers.  Not everyone has every EIP memorized.

author: cperezz.eth
content:
That was mainly a gutfeeling. As having EC, RSA is just there for compatibility with people that haven't upgraded.

nevertheless, that's good to know, thanks for rising the hand here!

author: __flcl
content:
A proposal to implement blob limit per tx via blob schedule was rejected quickly during ACD meeting, despite it was approved by a dozen of people before. I think it's still relevant:
- DA is an important part of Ethereum that will only grow in requirements in the future, multiple times, the limit seems to be essential part of this future tuning
- the chosen limit of 6 blobs seems to be an initial option that will change in the future for sure, to allow growing demand of L2s without losing atomicity of proofs sending
- tx pool is kinda simple, but we already changed it to handle bigger txs, mostly by imposing stricter constraints; instead I'd suggest to spend more time on research of potential real scalability improvements, so the pool can handle more transactions and of bigger size
